title: Total Blackout Accord
outcome: A vast blackout engulfs Stenograd as all BCI-connected devices fail citywide, bringing automated infrastructure and daily life to a halt. Council factions are forced into face-to-face negotiation and the city briefly reverts to pre-BCI days. No digital scoring functions, prompting an urgent power struggle over how to restore order.

events.description: Without warning, all BCI devices and linked city infrastructure go dark. Transit halts, services are unavailable, and digital identification fails.
Council factions gather for manual crisis meetings. Directorates demand emergency powers, while Harmonists lobby for community-led recovery efforts.
Neighborhoods self-organize using paper records and trusted intermediaries. Unapproved local leaders emerge, managing resources and dispute resolution.
Basic utilities are partially restored, but BCI systems remain offline. Black-market access to inactive BCI terminals surges as people seek out lost records.
A fragile power-sharing agreement is announced. The Council pledges to restore order, but new civic alliances challenge their legitimacy.
